original_text: Nevertheless, the high places were not taken away; the people continued to sacrifice and make offerings on the high places.
korean_text: 다만 산당들을 제거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 산당에서 제사하며 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless, the high places were not taken away
the people continued to sacrifice and make offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 백성은 계속하여 제사를 드리고 번제를 바쳤다
